alert.note: Alert for Dawes; North Sioux (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 17 at 3:26AM CST until January 18 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 5 PM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches for Converse, Niobrara, Dawes and Northern Sioux Counties. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 7 inches for Platte and Goshen Counties. * WHERE...Portions of the Nebraska panhandle and east central, south central and southeast Wyoming. * WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to 5 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
